WRITING.TITLE: Best way to spend Mesos
WRITING.TEXT:
I just came back from maple after a few years break. I'm on a fresh new account in Broa and i'm wondering the best way to fund myself. If i were to buy a $10 nx card and sell it, how much will i be able to sell it for and what are the best items i could buy with that money? Thanks.
Additional Info: level 110 Hero, no funded friends, ign:CDIZZLE

WRITING.TITLE: What are actual good things you can buy in the dollar store?

WRITING.TEXT: Elementary schools always told me that we were not allowed to use calculators in high school... Now highschool are telling us to buy a 100$ graphing calculator
Sometimes we play hockey in the classrooms too

WRITING.TITLE: Worst champion in a lane?
WRITING.TEXT: What is the absolute worst champ that can be played on: Top Jg Mid Adc Supp
